result.name: Instagram - ParanoidGram
result.description: Update: get the user.css file (a better way to install this theme) at: My Github A customizable dark Instagram theme with a few animations and effects. Right click is enabled in posts and stories. You can change every colour inside the theme. Feel free to suggest changes/give feedback. To use a background image, send the image you want to use as the background to a contact on Instagram or use the picture of an Instagram post. right click > open image in new tab and copy the link to that image. you can paste that link in the field "Enter URL" once you click "customize settings" If you upload the image it won't work, it has to be the method above.
result.notes:
#2.2.1

- Fixed a few texts and items.

#2.2.0 (26/01/2021)

- New background colour (same as the user.css version).
- New tag/mention colour.
- Fixed emoji picker shape.
- Dark loading placeholders.
- Recoloured some elements.
- A more visible text input for comments.
- Coloured arrows for posts/stories.


#2.1.0 (27/12/2020)

- New online status.
- New message status.
- Added version in feed and footer.
- Dark start-up background.
- Fixed profile icon in header not moving on hover.
- New loading bar.
- Removed the backdrop filter for the account preview that caused (a lot of) lag.
- Retouched some colours.


2.0.0 (12/12/2020)

Changed colour palette.
Fixed search result background.
Fixed message bubble colour.
Changed search colour.
Fixed 3-dot popup in dm.
Smaller scrollbar.
Better formatting.



1.2.0 (29/11/2020)

Name and version added.

1.1.0 (28/11/2020)

New login screen.
Coloured User tags.
Fixed changed account popup.
Fixed video view count and like popup.


1.0.2 

fixed username colour in following/followers modal.

1.0.1 

Easier way to select the background image.
More colour options.

1.0.0 

Release
